languages.text: ...попросить Абеляра, хорошо знающего устройство имперских кораблей, указать на возможный способ обойти опасный участок.
...ask Abelard, who was well-versed in the layout of Imperial ships, to plot a possible route around the perilous section.
languages.original_text: ...попросить Абеляра, хорошо знающего устройство имперских кораблей, указать на возможный способ обойти опасный участок.

traits.locale_text: ...ask Abelard, who was well-versed in the layout of Imperial ships, to plot a possible route around the perilous section.
...ask Abelard, who was well-versed in the layout of Imperial ships, to plot a possible route around the perilous section.
...ask Abelard, who was well-versed in the layout of Imperial ships, to plot a possible route around the perilous section.
...ask Abelard, who was well-versed in the layout of Imperial ships, to plot a possible route around the perilous section.

languages.text: ... pedir a Abelard, que conocía bien la distribución de las naves imperiales, que trazara una posible ruta que rodeara la zona peligrosa.
languages.original_text: ...ask Abelard, who was well-versed in the layout of Imperial ships, to plot a possible route around the perilous section.

traits.locale_text: ... pedir a Abelard, que conocía bien la distribución de las naves imperiales, que trazara una posible ruta que rodeara la zona peligrosa.

languages.text: ……请精通帝国舰船布局的阿贝拉德绘制一条可能的路线，绕过危险区域。
languages.original_text: ...ask Abelard, who was well-versed in the layout of Imperial ships, to plot a possible route around the perilous section.

traits.locale_text: ……请精通帝国舰船布局的阿贝拉德绘制一条可能的路线，绕过危险区域。

languages.text: …帝国軍の船のレイアウトに詳しいアベラルドに、危険な区域を迂回するルートを示すよう依頼した。
languages.original_text: ...ask Abelard, who was well-versed in the layout of Imperial ships, to plot a possible route around the perilous section.

traits.locale_text: …帝国軍の船のレイアウトに詳しいアベラルドに、危険な区域を迂回するルートを示すよう依頼した。

languages.text: ... Abelard zu fragen, der mit dem Aufbau imperialer Schiffe vertraut war, ob er nicht eine Route kenne, die den gefährlichen Bereich umgeht.
languages.original_text: ...ask Abelard, who was well-versed in the layout of Imperial ships, to plot a possible route around the perilous section.

traits.locale_text: ... Abelard zu fragen, der mit dem Aufbau imperialer Schiffe vertraut war, ob er nicht eine Route kenne, die den gefährlichen Bereich umgeht.

languages.text: ... de demander à Abélard, qui connaissait bien l'agencement des vaisseaux impériaux, de trouver un chemin contournant la section dangereuse.
languages.original_text: ...ask Abelard, who was well-versed in the layout of Imperial ships, to plot a possible route around the perilous section.

traits.locale_text: ... de demander à Abélard, qui connaissait bien l'agencement des vaisseaux impériaux, de trouver un chemin contournant la section dangereuse.

languages.text: ...İmparatorluk gemilerinin düzenine aşina olan Abelard'tan destek isteyecekti. Tehlikeli bölümün etrafından dolanan, olası bir rota belirlemeyi planlıyordu.
languages.original_text: ...ask Abelard, who was well-versed in the layout of Imperial ships, to plot a possible route around the perilous section.

traits.locale_text: Kararı doğrultusunda İmparatorluk gemilerinin düzenine aşina Abelard'tan destek istedi. Tehlikeli bölümün etrafından dolanan, olası bir rota belirlemeyi planlıyordu.
